- Working on Martial Arts and Medical projects with the 97 Display Development team.
- Great Communication and English Skills (written and spoken)
- Team based environment

Required Experience:
- At least 3 years in ASP.net MVC
- Good Knowledge of Entity Framework
- JQuery / HTML
- Solid Understanding of SQL
- Microsoft Certified is a BIG Plus
